title: Awesome List Updates on Jun 16, 2022
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Jun 16, 2022 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Ruby
items.content_text:
### Security

*   [Fingerprinter (⭐257)](https://github.com/erwanlr/Fingerprinter) - CMS/LMS/Library etc versions fingerprinter.
*   [haiti (⭐884)](https://github.com/noraj/haiti) - Hash type identifier (CLI & lib).
*   [Pipal (⭐647)](https://github.com/digininja/pipal) - Password analyser and statistics generator
*   [WhatWeb (⭐6k)](https://github.com/urbanadventurer/WhatWeb) - Website Fingerprinter.
*   [WPscan](http://wpscan.org/) - WordPress vulnerability scanner.
items.content_html:
Security

  • Fingerprinter (⭐257) - CMS/LMS/Library etc versions fingerprinter.
  • haiti (⭐884) - Hash type identifier (CLI & lib).
  • Pipal (⭐647) - Password analyser and statistics generator
  • WhatWeb (⭐6k) - Website Fingerprinter.
  • WPscan - WordPress vulnerability scanner.

items.title: Awesome React Components
items.content_text:
### Photo / Image

*   [react-photo-album (⭐662)](https://github.com/igordanchenko/react-photo-album) - [demo](https://react-photo-album.com/examples) - [docs](https://react-photo-album.com/documentation) - Responsive React Photo Gallery.
items.content_html:
Photo / Image

  • react-photo-album (⭐662) - demo - docs - Responsive React Photo Gallery.

items.title: Awesome Readme
items.content_text:
### Examples

*   [httpie/httpie (⭐36k)](https://github.com/httpie/httpie#readme) - Description of what the project does. Demo screenshots. Project logo. TOC for easy navigation. Build badges. Quick and simple installation and usage sections. Includes an examples section.

### Articles

*   ["Art of Readme - Learn the art of writing quality READMEs." (⭐7.1k)](https://github.com/hackergrrl/art-of-readme#readme) - *Stephen Whitmore*

### Tools

*   [Common Readme (⭐396)](https://github.com/hackergrrl/common-readme#readme) - A common readme style for Node. Includes a guide and a readme generator.
items.content_html:
Examples

  • httpie/httpie (⭐36k) - Description of what the project does. Demo screenshots. Project logo. TOC for easy navigation. Build badges. Quick and simple installation and usage sections. Includes an examples section.

Articles

  • "Art of Readme - Learn the art of writing quality READMEs." (⭐7.1k) - Stephen Whitmore

Tools

  • Common Readme (⭐396) - A common readme style for Node. Includes a guide and a readme generator.

items.title: Awesome Machine Learning
items.content_text:
### Clojure / General-Purpose Machine Learning

*   [scicloj.ml (⭐233)](https://github.com/scicloj/scicloj.ml) -  A idiomatic Clojure machine learning library based on tech.ml.dataset with a unique approach for immutable data processing pipelines.
items.content_html:
Clojure / General-Purpose Machine Learning

  • scicloj.ml (⭐233) - A idiomatic Clojure machine learning library based on tech.ml.dataset with a unique approach for immutable data processing pipelines.

items.title: Awesome Vehicle Security
items.content_text:
### Research Papers

*   [Modeling Inter-Signal Arrival Times for Accurate Detection of CAN Bus Signal Injection Attacks](https://dl.acm.org/citation.cfm?id=3064816)
items.content_html:
Research Papers

  • Modeling Inter-Signal Arrival Times for Accurate Detection of CAN Bus Signal Injection Attacks

items.title: Awesome Home Assistant
items.content_text:
### Dashboards / Icon packs

*   [simpleicons (⭐158)](https://github.com/vigonotion/hass-simpleicons) - Use the free icons from the simpleicons set.

### Custom Integrations / Alternative Dashboards

*   [Sonoff LAN (⭐3k)](https://github.com/AlexxIT/SonoffLAN) - Control Sonoff devices with eWeLink (original) firmware over LAN and/or Cloud.
*   [Spotcast (⭐770)](https://github.com/fondberg/spotcast) - Start Spotify playback on an idle Chromecast device as well as control Spotify connect devices.
items.content_html:
Dashboards / Icon packs

  • simpleicons (⭐158) - Use the free icons from the simpleicons set.

Custom Integrations / Alternative Dashboards

  • Sonoff LAN (⭐3k) - Control Sonoff devices with eWeLink (original) firmware over LAN and/or Cloud.
  • Spotcast (⭐770) - Start Spotify playback on an idle Chromecast device as well as control Spotify connect devices.

items.title: Awesome Vite
items.content_text:
### Open Source / Community

*   [Nhost (⭐8.6k)](https://github.com/nhost/nhost) - Nhost is an Open Source Firebase Alternative with GraphQL.
items.content_html:
Open Source / Community

  • Nhost (⭐8.6k) - Nhost is an Open Source Firebase Alternative with GraphQL.

items.title: Awesome Go
items.content_text:
### Email

*   [go-email-normalizer (⭐72)](https://github.com/dimuska139/go-email-normalizer) - Golang library for providing a canonical representation of email address.

### Go Tools / Libraries for creating HTTP middlewares

*   [gotemplate.io](https://gotemplate.io/) - Online tool to preview `text/template` templates live.
items.content_html:
Email

  • go-email-normalizer (⭐72) - Golang library for providing a canonical representation of email address.

Go Tools / Libraries for creating HTTP middlewares

  • gotemplate.io - Online tool to preview text/template templates live.
